titleStmt.title: A second letter unto a person of honour & quality containing some farther animadversions upon the Bishop of Worcester's letter together with a brief answer unto all that one L'S---- intends to write.
titleStmt.author: D. E.
Bagshaw, Edward, 1629-1671.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Edward Bagshaw--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: print show-through with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
